name: Transverse
desc: Transverse: video Loop sweeping through aorta

name: Proximal Aorta
desc: One of four transverse still views (Proximal, Mid, Distal, and Bifurcation).

name: Mid Aorta
desc: One of four transverse still views (Proximal, Mid, Distal, and Bifurcation).

name: Distal Aorta
desc: One of four transverse still views (Proximal, Mid, Distal, and Bifurcation).

name: Aortic Bifurcation
desc: One of four transverse still views (Proximal, Mid, Distal, and Bifurcation).

name: Sagittal
desc: Sagittal clip of the Aorta

name: Frame + Measure
desc: Sagittal frame of the Sagittal Aorta with measurement

name: Parasternal Long
desc: One of four primary cardiac views

name: Parasternal Short
desc: One of four primary cardiac views

name: Apical Four Chamber
desc: One of four primary cardiac views

name: Subxiphoid
desc: One of four primary cardiac views

name: Common Femoral Vein
desc: Must include from the saphenofemoral junction through the bifurcation of the common femoral vein to superficial and deep

name: Popliteal Vein
desc: Must include the popliteal vein throught the bifurcation

name: Superficial Femoral Vein
desc: Image of the Common Femoral Vein

name: RUQ
desc:
Must show:
• Morrison's Pouch
• Inferior renal pole
• Diaphragm

name: LUQ
desc:
Must show:
• Inferior renal pole
• Diaphragm

name: Sagittal Suprapubic
desc: Sagittal bladder view.

name: Transv. Suprapubic
desc: Transverse view of the gallbladder

name: Subxiphoid
desc: One of four potential cardiac views

name: Right Lung
desc: Assess for pneumothorax

name: Left Lung
desc: Assess for pneumothorax

name: Common Femoral Vein
desc: Must include from the saphenofemoral junction through the bifurcation of the common femoral vein to superficial and deep

name: Sagittal
desc: Sagittal sweep of the gallbladder

name: Transverse
desc: Transverse sweep of the gallbladder

name: Anterior Wall
desc: Must have measurement of anterior wall

name: Common Bile Duct
desc: Assess common bile duct for obstruction or masses

name: Heart
desc: Assess heart rate, EF, and contractility

name: IVC
desc: Assess vena cava responsiveness with respiration

name: Morrison's Pouch
desc: Assess Morison's pouch for potential internal bleeding

name: Aorta
desc: Assess aorta for potential ruptured abdominal aortic aneurysm

name: Pulmonary
desc: Assess lungs for potential tension pneumothorax

name: Measurement
desc: Measure width of IVC

name: Respiratory Variation
desc:
Measure width of IVC with inspiration.
Does it change by >50%?

name: Sagittal
desc: Sagittal view of the uterus

name: Transverse
desc: Transverse view of the uterus

name: Crown Rump Length
desc: Assessment of crown rump length

name: EMM
desc: Assessment of EMM

name: Fetal Heart Rate
desc: If FHR measured, must use M-mode. Avoid pulse wave doppler

name: Right Adnexa
desc: Examination of right adnexa for potential mass

name: Left Adnexa
desc: Examination of left adnexa for potential mass

name: Sagittal
desc: Sagittal view of the uterus

name: Transverse
desc: Transverse view of the uterus

name: Biparietal Diameter
desc: Measurement of one parietal bone to another, used to estimate fetal weight and gestational age.

name: Head Circumference
desc: Measurement of the head circumference

name: Femur Length
desc: Measurement of fetal femur length

name: Fetal Heart Rate
desc: Measurement of fetal heart rate

name: Transverse
desc: Transverse view of the eye

name: Transverse ONSD
desc: Transverse measurement of the optic nerve sheath

name: Sagittal
desc: Sagittal view of the eye

name: Sagittal ONSD
desc: Sagittal measurement of the optic nerve sheath

desc: Sagittal view of the left kidney

name: Left Measurement
desc: Measurement of the left kidney

name: Left Transverse
desc: Transverse view of the left kidney

desc: Sagittal view of the right kidney

name: Right Measurement
desc: Measurement of the right kidney

name: Right Transverse
desc: Transverse view of the right kidney

name: Sagittal
desc: Sagittal view of the kidney

name: Transverse
desc: Transverse view of the kidney

desc: Sagittal view of the normal kidney

name: Transverse Normal
desc: Transverse view of the normal kidney

name: Sagittal Abnormal
desc: Sagittal view of the abnormal kidney

name: Sagittal Abnormal
desc: Transverse view of the abnormal kidney

name: Measurement
desc: Measurement of kidney length (along long axis)

name: Anterior
desc: Looking for lung sliding. Recall, stills saved for pneumothorax must be m-mode

name: Lateral
desc: Looking for lung sliding. Stills are saved for pneumothorax must be m-mode

name: Posterior
desc: Use low frequency probe to look for B-lines. Set depth to 18cm.

name: CVP/Diaphragm
desc: Central venous pressure and diaphragm
